alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:10PM CDT until August 29 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 609 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wesley to Winslow, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Huntsville... Elkins... Winslow... St. Paul... Wesley... Saint Paul... Kingston... Aurora... Boston... Pettigrew... Brentwood... Japton... Witter... Marble... Georgetown... Woolsey... Red Star... Crosses... Combs... Dutton... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 42 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
